Search and download fine-mapping files

Source: R/finemapping_portal_API.R
GITHUB.portal_query.Rd

Search the echolocatoR Fine-mapping Portal for fine-mapping results, LD, and locus plots.

GITHUB.portal_query(
  dataset_types = NULL,
  datasets = NULL,
  phenotypes = NULL,
  loci = NULL,
  LD_panels = c("UKB", "1KGphase1", "1KGphase3"),
  file_types = c("multi_finemap", "LD", "plot"),
  results_dir = tempdir(),
  overwrite = F,
  nThread = parallel::detectCores() - 2,
  verbose = T
)

Examples

local_finemap <- GITHUB.portal_query(dataset_types="GWAS",
                                     phenotypes = c("schizophrenia","parkinson"),
                                     file_types = "multi_finemap",
                                     loci = c("BST1","CHRNB1","LRRK2",1:3),
                                     LD_panels=c("UKB","1KGphase3"))

#> [1] "Fetching echolocatoR Fine-mapping Portal study metadata."
#> [1] "+ 2 datasets remain after filtering."
#> [1] "+ Searching for multi_finemap files..."
#> [1] "+ 9 unique files identified."
#> [1] "+ Downloading 9 files..."
#> [1] "+ Returning local file paths."
